title.rendered: First Pic of Brad and Angelina’s Baby!

content.rendered:
Reading Time: < 1 minute

The Hollywood Gossip is proud to present the first public picture of the world’s most beautiful baby, Shiloh Nouvel Jolie-Pitt:
